评论概述: Adorable. Size up if you're between sizes!
评论详情: I'm 5'6 and weigh 155lbs. I'm often in between a medium and large in women's tops, so I bought both to see which fit better. The medium fit okay, but because of the side slits, the large fit much better. The medium just didn't drape right. Now that I've figured out the sizing, I plan to buy this in multiple colors. It's cute and perfect for the gym when paired with some cute leggings!
I tried so many kinds of gym shirts and finally I found one that is loose but flattering and fits so nicely top to bottom. I got two and love them!

Fabric is comfortable. Like the longer length.  However, the front rides up while sprint walking. If the neckline weren’t so tight (which is slightly uncomfortable), the back would really hang down. Just not comfortable enough for moi.

评论详情: Loved the fit, cut and fabric. Wore it once for a workout and noticed a hole. The fabric separated.
This product is thin. I do not mind in the gym, however I would not like to wear this top as casual wear due to the fact you can see my bra through it. Is breathable and true to size. Does not cling.

Was so excited for this shirt - I have been looking for workout shirts that provide coverage while being light and wicking. This shirt came in the perfect color, but the hem of the shirt was not the length shown in photos. Additionally, the back hem came in a different kind of fabric, and quickly got static after trying on. Because of that, along with a shorter hem, the shirt rode up from walking around in it.

Although I like this shirt and the style idea very much, I’m not sure if it hangs quite like I thought it would Though I think the fit is right  Comfortable to wear and a nice slightly more dressy casual blouse

I ordered two t-shirts, and the experience was somewhat inconsistent. One t-shirt arrived perfectly packaged and in excellent condition, just as expected for a new item. However, the other t-shirt arrived in a rather disappointing state: it was extremely wrinkled and seemed as if it had been previously opened, almost like it was a renewed item. This contrast in packaging and presentation impacted my overall experience with the purchase.

Fits true to size. Love this shirt to work out in or just for daily wearing. Love the way it fits my body, doesn’t cling. The side/back detail gives it a different look as well. I own this in five colors!

Love the purple/gray color of this shirt and the material is very soft. The split detail on the back hips fits a little odd and pulls open. Unfortunately it shrank after one wash which is the reason for the 2 star rating.
I absolutely loved this shirt, however it shrank.  Make sure you hang to dry.
I really like this blouse. It cool and comfortable and I like the style of it!

The bright pink is a good color but the fabric is really thin.  I prefer 1X in most name brands but Amazon suggested the 2X, which I bought. The fit is OK, but this shirt is a bit short on my 5'7" body and only hits the top of my hips so when my arms are overhead at the gym, this shirt will be above the waistband of my shorts/leggings.  I may be wearing this as a thin layer under a sweatshirt.

I wanted to like this shirt but it didn't work. Even the XXL was too fitted through my waist. It was more of a fit and flare look. I'm more of a roomy in the waist with a good placement on the hips kind of person. I found another shirt which was perfect. The fabric was OK. Really silky which was not my fave.

This shirt ran so crazy small. It is way tighter and shorter than shown. The side slits were not at my side but at my front. If it had been a bit tight I wouldn’t have minded, but it seemed like a totally different size than the tag mentioned.

I like the shirt but after the first wash, the accent stitching kind of encouraged wrinkling and slight shrinking of the thread. I had higher hopes from washing but…. The wrinkles fell out a while after wearing. The color is pretty and the shirt is quite comfortable.  Great for working out … or not! Lol

Not worth any price. Runs large. Bad fabric that gets worse with every wash. Followed laundering instructions, washed in cold. After only 1 wash, the black shirt I purchased was faded and the fabric wrinkled.

Amazon recommended Small. I ordered Medium. I needed Large.  Medium will do so I will not return.

评论概述: Cute but you will need to iron
评论详情: The shirt fits fine. I’m 5’8” & 155 lbs. The issue I have is that for a ‘Gym’ shirt, you should not have to iron it . Also, it does wrinkle very quickly when wearing.

So very much wanted to like this shirt - it was a great color and body fit was good - HOWEVER, it was NOT as depicted on the website. My first shirt arrived and the back panel was 3" shorter than the front - pretty much the exact opposite as shown on website picture.  It felt, and looked, like a complete mismatch of sizes.  I returned that shirt and asked for a replacement - only to have the same problem with the second shirt. While the difference was not as striking, the back panel was definitely shorter than the front even when laid out on a flat surface. So, it too was returned.  This was my first purchase of Gym People clothing and I was not impressed.
This top is well-made. It has good wicking properties. Easy to move in.
